ayah: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ
ayah_translit: ta'ruju al-malaikatu wal-ruhu ilayhi fi yawmin kana miq'daruhu khamsina alfa sanatin
ayah_english: Ascend the Angels and the Spirit to Him in a Day [is] its measure (is) fifty thousand year(s)

ayah: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ

ayah: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ
ayah_translit: yubassarunahum yawaddu al-muj'rimu law yaftadi min adhabi yawmi-idhin bibanihi
ayah_english: They will be made to see each other Would wish the criminal if he (could be) ransomed from (the) punishment (of) that Day by his children
word_tranlation: They will be made to see each other

ayah: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
ayah_translit: waman fi al-ardi jami'an thumma yunjihi
ayah_english: And whoever (is) on the earth all then it (could) save him

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina hum min adhabi rabbihim mush'fiquna

ayah: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ
ayah_translit: illa ala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru malumina
ayah_english: Except from their spouses or what they possess rightfully then indeed, they (are) not blameworthy

ayah: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
ayah_translit: famani ib'tagha waraa dhalika fa-ulaika humu al-'aduna
ayah_english: But whoever seeks beyond that then those [they] (are) the transgressors

ayah: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

ayah: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ
ayah_translit: ayatma'u kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yud'khala jannata na'imin
ayah_english: Does long every person among them that he enters a Garden (of) Delight

ayah: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ
ayah_translit: fala uq'simu birabbi al-mashariqi wal-magharibi inna laqadiruna
ayah_english: But nay! I swear by (the) Lord (of) the rising and the settings that We (are) surely Able

ayah: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ

ayah: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ
ayah_translit: ala an nubaddila khayran min'hum wama nahnu bimasbuqina
ayah_english: To that We replace (with) better than them; and not We (are) to be outrun

ayah: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

ayah: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: fadharhum yakhudu wayal'abu hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi yu'aduna
ayah_english: So leave them (to) converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ
ayah_translit: yawma yakhrujuna mina al-ajdathi sira'an ka-annahum ila nusubin yufiduna
ayah_english: (The) Day they will come out from the graves rapidly as if they (were) to a goal hastening

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ

ayah: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: khashi'atan absaruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun dhalika al-yawmu alladhi kanu yu'aduna
ayah_english: Humbled their eyes will cover them humiliation That (is) the Day which they were promised

ayah: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: khashi'atan absaruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun dhalika al-yawmu alladhi kanu yu'aduna
